source.name: introToChatbots
source.instructions:
## Which of the following are true about Chatbots?

**Hint:** There may be more than one correct answer.

answers.answer: They have to be Machine Learning based.
They use Natural Language Generation to respond.
Chatbots can be very simple and hard-coded or AI-based and sophisticated.

source.guidance:
Chatbots don't have to be ML-based. They can be as simple as a program comprised of a set of **hard-coded rules**, to very sophisticated **AI-based** chatbots that deliver **personalized responses** and learn as they go.

Highly sophisticated Chatbots that use pre-trained language models also use Natural Language Generation to deliver responses.
